ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: This is a great course to learn how to teach. I would certainly recommend this course to another student.

I would recommend this course to any student who will be teaching Spanish at Yale and/or beyond. It provides a thorough background in current approaches to modern language pedagogy and allows students to implement and experiment with them firsthand prior to entering the classroom as an instructor.
Yes. Take this course. You will learn a lot and it will also be fun.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course helped me to understand all that is required to become a good teacher. I'm not sure that this course contributed to my dissertation/research.

While this course is not particularly related to my academic research/dissertation, it is directly related to my future career goals as a university-level professor. In that respect, this course prepared me to teach students at a number of different proficiency levels and will be extremely useful as I teach and/or design courses at Yale and at any future institution(s).
